subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] More bread

Frank,
 
You can't find that book anymore in its original binding.  I know  because my 
wife and mother still have one from way back when.  Don't let  anything 
happen to that book cuz I am told they hold a very good value out there  on the 
market.  But much more of a value to those of us who love to  cook.
 
Jeff R
